## Funding

This project is funded by the [Digital and Data Literacy in Teaching Lab (DDLitLab)](https://www.isa.uni-hamburg.de/en/ddlitlab.html){target="_blank"}, an initiative by the [ISA-Zentrum](https://www.isa.uni-hamburg.de/) at the [University of Hamburg](https://www.uni-hamburg.de/en.html).
The Digital and Data Literacy in Teaching Lab program is in turn funded by [Stiftung Innovation in der Hochschullehre](https://stiftung-hochschullehre.de/en/){target="_blank"} (details can be found [here](https://stiftung-hochschullehre.de/projekt/ddlitlab/){target="_blank"}).

Our project proposal can be found [here](https://lennartwittkuhn.com/ddlitlab) (in German).

Special thanks to [Carolin Scharfenberg](https://www.isa.uni-hamburg.de/en/ddlitlab/team/scharfenberg-carolin.html){target="_blank"} for help with project coordination and administration as well as [Moritz Kreinsen](https://www.isa.uni-hamburg.de/en/ddlitlab/team/kreinsen-moritz.html){target="_blank"} and [SÃ¶ren-Kristian Berger](https://www.isa.uni-hamburg.de/en/ddlitlab/team/berger-soeren-kristian.html){target="_blank"} for support in the application process.
